reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay at Griya Santrian Sanur.The staff were lovely and the hotel grounds were beautiful.Our room was a good size with a balcony looking out towards the ocean, very, very relaxing.I particularly liked that the hotel has two pools, a large one on the beach and a smaller one at the back of the hotel. We favoured the smaller as it was quieter and less people.
reviews.title: holiday in sanur

reviews.text: It is in a wonderful location, fabulous restaurants, all within walking distance.
reviews.title: Great relaxing and friendly place to stay

reviews.text: We have been travelling to Bali over Christmas for many years and discovered this hotel about eight years ago. Since then we have finished or annual visit to Bali with a few relaxing nights in this hotel before flying home.
reviews.title: Lovely & relaxing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location on the beach is excellent and the hotel facilities are great, three pools, bars and restaurant all well attended by staff. It has a good range of accommodation. We have always had the same rooms (Deluxe rooms) at our request which are great. Speaking with other guests staying in other types of rooms gives the impression that they are generally pretty happy also.
reviews.title: What a lovely holiday !

reviews.text: While the hotel and facilities are great an outstanding feature is the generally (there is always the odd exception) friendly and very helpful nature of the staff. Having stayed there for some time when we return we are always remembered and warmly welcomed back. Have no hesitation in going back to this hotel or recommending it to anyone looking for a really good place to stay in Sunar.
reviews.title: Wonderful experience
Wonderful location on Sindhu Beach
reviews.text: Lovely hotel. Had a Garden View Room which was very spacious and clean.
The bathroom is in serious need of renovation, but there is a lot of renovation going
reviews.title: Perfect stay

reviews.text: on at the hotel, so am assuming this is next. Reasonably priced meals and drinks, and the
reviews.title: Great hotel in a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: location is to die for. Right on the lovely clean beach, great lounges etc. Also in good location
reviews.title: Relaxing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: as regards to the many great restaurants on the main drag. Would definitely recommend.
reviews.title: Griya Santrian.Untold about major building works throughout hotel from 05/02/2013
From room to pool in less than 15 steps
reviews.text: Just came back from 7 nights stay. This was our first time in Sanur, and the Griya. We arrived in the late evening and were given filled towels and a welcome drink during our check in. We were informed that the hotel had a building project going on currently and to compensate for any inconvenience or disturbance we were given a complementary dinner. We had requested a twin room which was not available but were given a room with a queen and single bed, which was comfortable and spacious. We had a huge walk in shower in the ensuite which was great, the room was clean and bottled water was supplied everyday. Our room was located overlooking one of the 3 pools "The Pond" which was lined with palm and frangipani trees. it was a great spot and was very restful, although I suspect in high season the noise coming from the street could become tiresome. The gardens and pools are tended constantly and are delightful.
The staff are friendly and courteous, although the service in the restaurant could be a bit hit and miss. The breakfast selection is not the best and most days we went outside.
reviews.title: Laid back holiday with extended family ...

reviews.text: This holiday was all about doing nothing, unwinding and resting which we did in plenty and I look forward to staying at this hotel again.
reviews.title: best place in Sanur

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our first stay in Sanur (we usually stay in Legian), and there were 9 of us ranging in age from 6 – 55 years, including 3 teens.
reviews.title: A good choice if this is what suits

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our experience with Griya Santrian was above average right from the start when we were dealing with Yulia by email with our initial enquiries, through to our bookings (5 rooms in total). Yulia was always professional and prompt with all her replies.
reviews.title: amazing

reviews.text: Stayed 6 nights in November and would definately go back, the resort is right on the beach so you have the choice of the lovely pools or the beach to relax by. The staff are super helpful the rooms are fine, couldn't fault the place.
reviews.title: wonderful resort

reviews.text: Stayed here for a few nights during a 4 week trip round Bali - easily the worst value for money of all the places we stayed.
reviews.title: Overpriced, misleading photos when booking online, nice grounds and good beach area

reviews.text: The hotel is undergoing major building work which we were unaware of until arrival. We were offered a free meal as a 'good will' gesture but unfortunately the meal at the inhouse restaurant was terrible!
reviews.title: We keep coming back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room photos on the website showed a nice rain shower but the room we had had an old shower that was little more than a trickle.
reviews.title: Relax, sunbathe, eat and drink, swim, sleep

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was not included in our package and we were told it would be 10$us to purchase - turns out that's before tax which we found out later - we tried it only once and it was no where near worth the money!
reviews.title: Really nice property, let down by restaurant.
